posts.post_content: Remember you can also reveal cards with the *Shapeshifter* creature subtype as part of the casting cost. A 3/3 for {1}{G} alone is nuts even for {G}, throw in *deathtouch* and a notoriously ridiculous creature subtype and you have a very versatile uncommon. Interestingly enough, this card also sports the Warrior subtype, which although not as rampant as elf tribal, still has some cards that interact postively with it, although most of them are {R}, such as [Lovisa Coldeyes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lovisa Coldeyes).
posts.html:
Remember you can also reveal cards with the Shapeshifter creature subtype as part of the casting cost. A 3/3 for {1}{G} alone is nuts even for {G}, throw in deathtouch and a notoriously ridiculous creature subtype and you have a very versatile uncommon. Interestingly enough, this card also sports the Warrior subtype, which although not as rampant as elf tribal, still has some cards that interact postively with it, although most of them are {R}, such as Lovisa Coldeyes.
